item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Wickenden Pub!

The Wickenden Pub is a Providence institution! Its divey in a good way, but cozy; and the beer selection is very good and cheap. Can't beat that!!! Look for the wooden door and beer sign - its hard to believe we haven't had an official Monday night here since 2008 - my goodness! So if you haven't been yet or you're a regular - let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Wickenden Pub
